scripts.client:build: cd src/client/ && npm run build && mv build ../../dist/
scripts.all:install: npm run server:install && npm run client:install
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf src/client/node_modules
scripts.ci:install: npm run clean && npm run server:install && npm run client:install
scripts.ci:build: npm run server:build && npm run client:build
scripts.ci:dev: start http://localhost:8080 && start http://localhost:8080/api/subs && node dist/server.js
scripts.postinstall: npm run server:build && npm run client:install && npm run client:build
